column1: Smoque BBQ////When people are willing to wait over an hour outside the restaurant for the food
column2: that says a lot! My St. Louis ribs were sooooo good! It was tender
column4: and exactly what I needed.  The Mac & Cheese was surprisingly yums too! I'm very picky about my mac & cheese
column5: none of that kraft easy mac stuff for me!  This one came with a great crust and very cheesy on the inside.  The pulled pork was super succulent and very flavorful
column6: even without the bbq sauce.  The brisket was almost too tender
column7: I had the hardest time trying to pick up a piece with my fork.  The Brisket Chili was their special side of the day
column9: I'd probably try the beans next time..or just get 2 mac & cheeses!
